name: Germ Buster
description:
Bust away germs in this platforming game where you must venture through different parts of the human body to cleanse away the germs and any other parasites. 

Story Summary: One day, a sickly patient has been found to have an abnormally amount of germs and parasites in his or her body, so you must deal with the germs...from the inside.

Note: Prototype sprites are still in use, for the final sprites are not finished yet.
